options.name: Adaptive Shield
options.description: When using a shield as your Conduit, your shield offers adaptive mitigation against a single damage type equal to your spell damage bonus modifier. In response to taking arcane, dark, divine or elemental damage, you can elect to spend 1 power to change your adaptive mitigation to that type for the next minute.

options.name: Free Action : Shield Charge
options.description: Immediately after Channeling a Spell and while you have an active adaptive mitigation, the Spell becomes Charged but you lose the adaptive Mitigation.

options.name: Reaction : Retaliatory Spell
options.description: In response to being attacked by a Melee Attack by an Adjacent Creature, retaliate with a Touch Spell against the attacking Creature using your Block Check against the attack as the Spell Attack.

options.name: Improved Adaptive Shield
options.description: Gain +1 Spell Damage. Additionally, your Adaptive Shield trait no longer requires power and does not expire.

options.name: Action : Spellburst
options.description: While using your shield as a Conduit, you channel a Ray Spell that takes 1 Action but it is converted to a 1 Unit wide Line Spell instead.

options.name: Arcane Aegis
options.description: Gain +1 Block while wielding a Shield, +2 Arcane Mitigation and +1 Elemental Mitigation.
